====================================================
Body Plot -- models generic slabs of a 3 rock earth
====================================================



Rock0
======
The properties of the first rock in the earth model( Vp, Vs, Rho ).

Rock1
======
The rock properties of the channel( Vp, Vs, Rho ).

Rock2
=====
Rock properties underneath the channel( Vp,Vs,Rho ). Optional argument that will default to Rock1.

left
=====
Two points specifying the depths of the left-hand side of the slab. The difference will be the thickness of the slab.

right
=====
Two points specifying the depths of the right-hand side of the slab. The difference will be the thickness of the slab.

margin
=======
The x location of the lower vertices of the slab. 

slice
======
Specify which type of cross-section to plot. 

trace
======
If not using a spatial slice, specify which trace to view a cross section of.

.. include:: defaultargs.rst
